hero.title: Succeeding Together,
hero.description: We produce social benefit-oriented projects to support quality and accessible education, ensure gender equality, and empower youth and women.

weAre.title: Who Are We?
weAre.subtitle: We are a team that believes in education, equality, and social benefit; producing and growing together.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Hypatia is a community that advocates for gender equality, promotes quality and accessible education, and develops social responsibility projects led by youth and women that create real impact. By establishing a solidarity network extending from local to global, we ensure individuals are not just participants but active subjects of change.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Hypatia aims to be a global movement led by young people and women shaping the future. It is to build a future where education is accessible, equality becomes the norm, and collective power makes a sustainable world possible. With this vision, we will continue to empower future generations and lead a more inclusive, fair, and hopeful social transformation.

empowerment.title: Empowering Women and Youth
empowerment.description: Youth and women dream, take action, and inspire.

education.title: Quality and Accessible Education
education.description: Every child should be empowered with an education that gives confidence and hope.

equality.title: Gender Equality
equality.description: Gender is not for silencing our voices; it is for celebrating our diversity.

AboutPage.title: Who Are We?
AboutPage.description: We are a young and dynamic community shaping the future by leading technology and producing together.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: Our mission at Hypatia is to bring together every young person interested in technology and design to maximize their potential. With project-based learning methodology, we offer our members the opportunity to solve real-world problems and enrich their portfolios.
mission.p2: By encouraging cooperation among our members from different disciplines, we enable them to develop both their technical skills and teamwork competencies.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The fundamental principles that make us who we are.

innovation.title: Innovation and Creativity
innovation.description: We encourage a curiosity that pushes boundaries and pursues new and original ideas.

collaboration.title: Collaboration and Community
collaboration.description: We believe that success flourishes in a supportive environment where diverse talents come together.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: We keep up with the speed of technology and see every project as an opportunity to improve ourselves.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: At Hypatia Community, we value your privacy. This text summarizes what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights when using our website.

dataCollection.title: Data Collected
dataCollection.content: We may collect information you provide to us via contact forms, application forms, or email, such as your name, surname, email address, school/city. In addition, technical data regarding your use of the site (such as device, browser, IP) may be processed to a limited extent.

usage.title: Use of Data
usage.content: We use the data to evaluate applications, provide feedback, communicate community announcements, and improve service quality.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes. Sharing is not made except for legal obligations or mandatory technical providers to provide the service.

retention.title: Retention Period
retention.content: Data is stored for the period required by the purpose of processing and is deleted in accordance with relevant legal regulations.

rights.title: Your Rights
